Articles.Content:
This borders on modding, but wth...

I'm not happy with how exploration contracts are dealt out. Apparently there can be only one at a time, and right now, for me, it is a one-star contract, "do a spacewalk near the Mun". I don't want to dedicate a mission solely to that purpose.

I'd like to tweak it so that a) I can have more exploration contracts on offer and b) only get the more demanding three-star types.

Only, how do? I've had a look at Squad's Contracts.cfg and it seems as if exploration contracts are not defined there. Either that, or I suffer from a kind of situational blindness.
I think this is in the wrong part of the forum?
@Andetch You're right. I've reported my post and asked for it to be moved.

Admin will be round soon! I only mention this because you will be unlikely to get your answer here. And I am also interested in the answer. I tend to leave ships/labs around mun and minimus so I can do these contracts as they pop up. 

My advice with your current mission would be to test a new SSTO or something with a min flyby. (Or use mine)
